page.shortlink: api mark object run silent function
page.description: Runs a Mark operation without displaying any prompts

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created mark operation.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table to mark.

page.discussion: The MARK.RUN_SILENT() method runs a previously defined mark operation.
